EmailTemplate.description: Notify Seller of late Fee Start
EmailTemplate.name: Inform Seller of Title Late Fee
EmailTemplate.subject: Late Title: {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c}, VIN {!Case.Vehicle_VIN_Last_6__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Our office has yet to receive the title paperwork for {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c} {!Case.Vehicle_VIN_Last_6__c}, sold on {!Case.Auction_End__c}.
The title and any paperwork were due by {!Case.Title_Due_Date__c}. A fee of $25 per day will be applied up to a maximum of $250 until ACV receives the title and any needed paperwork.
If you have any questions, please reach out to your Territory Manager, {!Case.Seller_Territory_Manager__c}.
Thank you,
Titles Team ACV Auctions
